about_the_game:
VEGAS Pro Edit 21 Steam Edition is here to fulfill all your gaming video editing needs, for your stream highlights or epic gameplays. With powerful new features like Z-Depth, you can now create captivating video composites and make your content pop like never before.

Whether it's showcasing your exceptional strategies, pointing out Easter eggs or sharing valuable tips, VEGAS Pro Edit 21 has got you covered. Automatically isolate specific elements in your footage, such as characters, and apply effects exclusively to them thanks to Smart Mask. Highlight key moments with special effects like glitches or slow motion and create striking looks with powerful HDR color grading.

Get your audience hyped about that final boss or show them how to complete impossible side quests with videos that stand out from the crowd.

Highlights

  • Edit video & audio with intuitive and powerful tools
  • Use Z-Depth to create visually striking video composites
  • Put specific objects or characters in the spotlight with Smart Mask
  • Choose from a wide array of powerful effects, filters, transitions & titles
  • Create original custom transitions and effects with Adjustment Events, the new Offset and Wrap OFX plug-in and GL transitions
  • Apply powerful color grading and LUTs to create the perfect look for your project
  • Upscale your video and repair problematic footage fast with AI-powered tools

What’s new? 

  • NEW AI Z-Depth- the AI-assisted compositing and masking tool
  • NEW AI Smart Mask for videos- the AI-powered Bézier mask generator
  • NEW Adjustment events- the perfect tool to create sophisticated custom events like VFX
  • NEW Offset and Wrap OFX- the ideal plug-in to create motion effects on video images
  • NEW Import Mocha stabilization data- the motion tracking and stabilization tool
  • NEW GL transitions- two new transition pre-sets

  • Processor: 6th Generation Intel Core i5 (or AMD equivalent) or better with 2.5 Ghz and 4 Cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RECOMMENDED FOR HD: -NVIDIA® GeForce RTX or GTX 9XX series or higher with 4GB AMD/ATI® Radeon with 4GB and VCE 3.0 or higher (Radeon Pro series with 8GB for HDR and 32 bit projects) Intel® GPU HD Graphics 530 series or higher
